summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Archipelago Scent premium parfum website. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend 85% functional with minor UI interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Quiz modal buttons not clickable due to overlay interception
Cart drawer not found after adding product to cart
Islands collection page shows 0 islands instead of 6

integration_issues.issue: Checkout form elements not found with expected selectors

passed_tests: All 15 backend endpoints (islands, products, quiz, orders, theme, FAQ)
Homepage with hero parallax slideshow and 6 island cards
Shop page with filters (Island, Mood, Olfactive Family)
Product detail pages with add to cart functionality
Admin dashboard with stats and navigation
Admin islands and products management access
Support page with 5 FAQ accordion items
Navigation with 6 links and footer with 11 links
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix quiz modal overlay interception issue, implement cart drawer functionality, fix islands collection page data loading, and verify checkout form selectors
